title: ~Personal Patio or Balcony, ~Wired for technology
map_address: 156 N Murrieta Blvd near Olivina Avenue
posting_body: Welcome to the charming and convenient lifestyle of The Crossing at Arroyo Trail Apartments, located in the heart of Livermore, California.

Our pet-friendly community presents an exceptional array of one-, two-, and three- bedroom floor plans featuring personal patios and oversized windows that provide ample natural light and beautiful nature views.
Live in the serenity of a park-like setting with all professional and personal conveniences within easy reach via I-580 and Highway 84.
The San Francisco Premium Outlets, Trader Joe's, and the Arroyo Bike Trail are all just minutes from your doorstep.
Schedule a visit to view The Crossing at Arroyo Trail today!
Use the link below for more details:
This is a 2 Bedroom, 1 Bath, approximately 865 Sq.
- ~Spacious One-, Two-, and Three- Bedroom Apartment Homes
- Within Close Proximity to Shopping, Fine Dining, Recreation and Scenic Parks
- Easy Access to the Livermore Wine Region
- Easy Access to I-580 and Highway 84
Please contact us for more information and details.
